-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Bit Field Field Reset Typical Field Verif Pos Name Type Value Value Description Type ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------- <23:0> ADDR R/W X X Circular Buffer Start Address1 | $PR The Circular Buffer Start Address register indicates the start of the circular buffer. If the circular buffer feature is enable, when the transfer exceeds the Circular Buffer End Address, the HMM wraps the transfer address to the Circular Buffer Start address. This register is for the 2nd data stream. This register is only valid if the HMM port is an interleaved port. <31:24> RSVD RAZ 0 0 reserved. | $PR --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Value Description Type ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------- <23:0> ADDR R/W X X Circular Buffer Start Address3 | $PR The Circular Buffer Start Address register indicates the start of the circular buffer. If the circular buffer feature is enable, when the transfer exceeds the Circular Buffer End Address, the HMM wraps the transfer address to the Circular Buffer Start address. This register is for the 4th data stream. This register is only valid if the HMM port is an interleaved port. <31:24> RSVD RAZ 0 0 reserved. | $PR --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
